page.title: 16Gadgets in Spennymoor.
page.content: We went out and we interviewed people on their labour saving devices. The most popular thing was the{washing {machine}with 49%. After tha washing machine was the{vacuum cleaner}with a total of 20%. next was the{car}with 13% and after the car was the{lawn {mower}with 4%. Three items all came next with 1% : the food mixer, the electric drill and the microwave oven. Last of all were seven items. These were the sewing machine, launderette, pressure cooker, saw attachment, Dutch hoe, hair dryer and cooker.
